oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We define a statistic, called weight, on involutions and consider two applications in which this statistic arises. Let I(n) denote the set of all involutions on [n](={1,2,..., n}) and let F(2n) denote the set of all fixed point free involutions on [2n]. For an involution delta, let \ delta \ denote the number of 2-cycles in delta. Let [n](q)=1+q+...+q(n-1) and let ((n)(k))(q) denote the q-binomial coefficient.
